ValidationRule.description: If the Phase is set to Closed, lock select fields.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Phase__c, "Closed"), OR( ISCHANGED(Start_Date__c), ISCHANGED(Date_Closed__c), ISCHANGED(Estimated_Hours_to_Complete__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Ticket is Closed. These fields are locked: Capitalization, Start Date, Date Closed, Estimated Hours to Complete.
